body_html:
@skye This is ready for review again. Summary of changes

  • Addressed all review comments (including python code re-formatting using yapf)
  • Changed syntax to align closer with spark API; / -> ., .[ -> [
  • Added a switch to configure.py; To compile with avro support the user must point to the avro lib install on the system

We'll leave the full support of namespaces for later. We'll introduce this feature in a backward compatible way (essentially the use of no namespace as of now will be supported as well)

Addressed all review comments (including python code re-formatting using yapf)
Changed syntax to align closer with spark API; / -> ., .[ -> [
Added a switch to configure.py; To compile with avro support the user must point to the avro lib install on the system

We'll leave the full support of namespaces for later.  We'll introduce this feature in a backward compatible way (essentially the use of no namespace as of now will be supported as well)
body:
@skye This is ready for review again. Summary of changes
- Addressed all review comments (including python code re-formatting using yapf)
- Changed syntax to align closer with spark API; / -> ., .[ -> [
- Added a switch to configure.py; To compile with avro support the user must point to the avro lib install on the system

We'll leave the full support of namespaces for later.  We'll introduce this feature in a backward compatible way (essentially the use of no namespace as of now will be supported as well)
